name: Waifu Crush
description:
Day after day, tired of your current real life, you decide to join a virtual simulation game then change your life here.
Encountering girls, making friends with them, hiring them to work for you and become a real boss!

*Features:
- Gorgeous girls with unique personality
- HuniePop-like match 3 puzzle game with indirect matching mechanic (freely to move token in column and row)
- Complex dating sim gameplay mixed with Visual Novel and light RPG elements.
- Dynamic Live2D CG with many artwork
- Over 2000 lines of dialog, fully and professionally voice acted
- Beautiful background artwork
- Catchy tune and upbeat tempo music
- Many items to unlock and collect as gifts
